title: 511. Do You Need a Die Cutting Machine?
description:
We're sharing the basics on what a die cutting machine is, how it can help in your sewing room, and what to consider before buying one. We know buying a die cutting system is a big purpose, so walk you through the steps of what to think about while shopping. We also chat with Lori Miller, a talented quilter, designer, and educator for both AccuQuilt and Electric Quilt.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-511-do-you-need-a-die-cutting-machine
Email us at APQPodcast@meredith.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
